question: What amount of expenditure has been approved by the Union Cabinet for wage subsidy via EPFO?
explanation:
The Union Cabinet headed by the Prime Minister Narendra Modi, has approved an expenditure of Rs.22,810 crore, for providing a wage subsidy through the employeeâ€™s provident fund organization (EPFO). 
This is a part of the Atmanirbhar Bharat Rojgar Yojana. This move is set to incentivize creation of new job opportunities during the Covid recovery phase of the economy.
